name: Wario Land 4: Parallel World
storyline: Wario is reading the newspaper when he notices an article about a mysterious pyramid found deep in the jungle. The legend related to the pyramid is that of Princess Shokora, ruler of the pyramid, who was cursed by the money-crazed Golden Diva. Without wasting time and forgetting to take his mid-morning nap, Wario jumps into his Wario Car and drives to the pyramid. As he enters it, he finds a black cat and chases it. Doing so, he falls down a precipice and is stuck inside the pyramid.
summary:
A complete rom hack of Wario Land 4, released on the date of 20th Anniversary for Wario Land 4.

It features remixed levels and bosses based on their original concept, new difficulty modes and newly added music.
